name: MVP Vault
overview:
MVPVault.com is the Facebook for athletes looking to get scouted and recruited. It currently has an extensive network of high level coaches and scouts signed up. The coaches and scouts can access the player database and contact athletes privately to initiate a conversation. MVPVault.com is loaded with Facebook and Twitter features to aid with a smooth transition to the network. Players, Parents, Fans, Coaches and scouts are the five different types of users that can sign up.

Athletes can create a free profile and fill out the following: their statistics, photos, video game footage, academic information and any other sporting related information.

While this website is based around athletes promoting themselves and coaches/scouts finding top new prospects their is a very strong social side to the site. With new features being added daily this is truly a sports social network.
